Plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.
Title: Sling Blade
Writer: Billy Bob Thornton (play), Billy Bob Thornton (screenplay)
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Dwight Yoakam, J.T. Walsh, John Ritter
tomatoConsensus: You will see what's coming, but the masterful performances, especially Thornton's, will leave you riveted.
